structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

text.section: The director shall submit the transportation center budget in the manner and form set forth for other units of the university, after approval by the transportation center board.
Copies of the approved budget shall be filed with the transportation center board and the Legislative Research Commission.

law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 394, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1984.
